mapper.select: select * from SUB_MER_RATE where SUB_MER_ID=#{subMerId} AND STATUS='1'
select SMR.*,SMI.SUB_MER_NAME from SUB_MER_RATE SMR LEFT JOIN SUB_MER_INFO SMI ON SMI.SUB_MER_ID = SMR.SUB_MER_ID where SMR.SUB_MER_ID=#{subMerId} AND SMR.STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUB_MER_RATE (SUB_MER_ID, RATE_TYPE, TRANS_RATE, TRANS_RATE_H, TRANS_HIGHEST_FEE, TRANS_RATE_NO_TOP, LOWEST_FEE, AGENT_L1_RATE, AGENT_L1_RATE_H,AGENT_L1_HIGHEST_FEE,AGENT_L1_PROFIT_RATE,AGENT_L1_NO_TOP, AGENT_L2_RATE, AGENT_L2_RATE_H, AGENT_L2_HIGHEST_FEE,AGENT_L2_PROFIT_RATE,AGENT_L2_NO_TOP, AGENT_L3_RATE, AGENT_L3_RATE_H,AGENT_L3_HIGHEST_FEE,AGENT_L3_PROFIT_RATE,AGENT_L3_NO_TOP, AGENT_L4_RATE, AGENT_L4_RATE_H,AGENT_L4_HIGHEST_FEE,AGENT_L4_PROFIT_RATE,AGENT_L4_NO_TOP, AGENT_L5_RATE,AGENT_L6_RATE,AGENT_L7_RATE, AGENT_L8_RATE,AGENT_L9_RATE,AGENT_L10_RATE, CREATE_TIME,STATUS) VALUES(#{subMerId},#{rateType}, #{transRate}, #{transRateH}, #{transHighestFee},#{transRateNoTop},#{lowestFee}, #{agentL1Rate}, #{agentL1RateH}, #{agentL1HighestFee},#{agentL1ProfitRate},#{agentL1NoTop}, #{agentL2Rate}, #{agentL2RateH}, #{agentL2HighestFee},#{agentL2ProfitRate},#{agentL2NoTop}, #{agentL3Rate}, #{agentL3RateH}, #{agentL3HighestFee},#{agentL3ProfitRate},#{agentL3NoTop}, #{agentL4Rate}, #{agentL4RateH}, #{agentL4HighestFee},#{agentL4ProfitRate},#{agentL4NoTop}, #{agentL5Rate},#{agentL6Rate},#{agentL7Rate}, #{agentL8Rate},#{agentL9Rate},#{agentL10Rate}, #{createTime},#{status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE SUB_MER_RATE
TRANS_RATE = #{teransRate},
TRANS_RATE_H = #{transRateH},
TRANS_HIGHEST_FEE = #{transHighestFee},
TRANS_RATE_NO_TOP = #{transRateNoTop},
AGENT_L1_RATE = #{agentL1Rate},
AGENT_L1_HIGHEST_FEE = #{agentL1HighestFee},
AGENT_L1_PROFIT_RATE = #{agentL1ProfitRate},
AGENT_L2_RATE = #{agentL2Rate},
AGENT_L2_HIGHEST_FEE = #{agentL2HigestFee},
AGENT_L2_PROFIT_RATE = #{agentL2ProfitRate},
AGENT_L1_NO_TOP = #{agentL1NoTop},
AGENT_L2_NO_TOP = #{agentL2NoTop},
AGENT_L3_RATE = #{agentL3Rate},
AGENT_L4_RATE = #{agentL4Rate},
AGENT_L5_RATE = #{agentL5Rate},
AGENT_L6_RATE = #{agentL6Rate},
AGENT_L7_RATE = #{agentL7Rate},
AGENT_L8_RATE = #{agentL8Rate},
AGENT_L9_RATE = #{agentL9Rate},
AGENT_L10_RATE = #{agentL10Rate},
WHERE SUB_MER_ID = #{subMerId}
UPDATE SUB_MER_RATE SET SUB_MER_TRACT=#{subMerTract} WHERE SUB_MER_ID=#{subMerId} AND STATUS=#{status}
